Climbing the Ladder, one cigar at a time...

Southern Draw is one of the newest brands to hit our shelves, and I have to say, bravo. Each created by AJ Fernandez in Nicaragua, so you can expect some big things from this brand. Each blend is comprised of the best tobaccos and crafted with precision.

Jacob's Ladder is easily one of Southern Draw's most flavorful cigars. Best described as heavenly, this handmade treat features a Pennsylvania Broadleaf wrapper and is brimming with Nicaraguan fillers leading to notes of cedar, spice, and espresso. This delicious little gem will surely leave you wanting more â€” an easy contender for a "must-have" boutique box.
